title: flashing in base
body:
Hello guys , 
I got this idea about "flashing in base" it is happening to me a lot and to everyone else ,  so instead of loosing the cooldiwn when flashing inside the fountain , the flash doesnt go off cooldown , it's like you didnt flash at all , i think flash is a very important summoner spell , and loosing it randomly really hurts .

replies.body: im not sure i understand. you want infinite flashes if you're in your fountain? that's just silly.

Because if you misinput (trying to chat but you forgot to press enter or whatever your binding is), BOOM! You just lost flash. There goes a good escape tool, a good killing tool and a bit more. At least for 6 minutes. The point is to make it so that  you can't screw up a input and lose a important thing.

Yeah lets give me my ult back too.

and redemption, and locket, and heal, ghost and clarity
just be more careful is all i can say. it happens, and you shouldn't get a freebie because you made a mistake. its not like flash is randomly going off without input.
Are you saying that in the first 15 seconds when you can't use flash, for it instead to just not have a cooldown? I could see that being hilarious, but not useful really.

yea just be more careful
imagine the enemy nomming at ur nexus and u need that extra dash to get in range for an ability to finish off a low joe that would otherwise run from you and around the nexus, still hitting it
